html:
hater you don't know me
i am where wolf howls
where steel is being made
in travel behind a see far away
with people of high sample
when a meteorite falls
when stars shine on the sky
where peace is being established
under watch of God all merciful
worth more than you think
when a race is over
when a patient gets back to life
trees are silent around
a raven sometimes caws
a king grunts in muse
hater you don't know me
title: Hater
